[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Echo {
        echo: Span(
            1,
            7,
        ),
        values: [
            Literal(
                Integer(
                    LiteralInteger {
                        value: "1",
                        span: Span(
                            1,
                            12,
                        ),
                    },
                ),
            ),
        ],
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                1,
                13,
            ),
        ),
    },
]
